Message: The user completes the submission of the form
Need to generate a API Access Tokens

To generate your API Access Token, please follow these steps:
1. Log in to the Newsbreak Admanager Platform.
2. Click on Tools - Resources - API Access Tokens.
3. Click 'Generate token' to create your own API access token.
Remember, this token is tied to your user ID and should not be shared with anyone else. For more details, you can refer to this article: [How do I fetch my API access token?](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/27680147056397-API-Integration-Guide).
the button is grayed out and I cannot select it

I'm sorry to hear that you're having trouble generating your API access token. If the button is grayed out, it might be due to a permission issue or an account setup problem. Please ensure that your account is fully verified and has the necessary permissions. If the issue persists, I recommend contacting our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com for further assistance.
